about_the_game:
A small country in the eastern part of fantastical medieval Europe is teeming with bounty hunters — the most cunning scoundrels among those chasing easy money. And you are one of them.

You're no master of the sword, nor are you a seasoned warrior. Lies, deception, and betrayal are your only weapons. Yet despite that, you've set your sights on the most dangerous target of all—the legendary criminal, Ralph Devora. Will you be able to take him down on your own, or will you seek help from questionable allies? The choice is yours.

I won't wish you luck, because I don't believe in it one bit.

What Awaits You:

  • 8 charismatic characters—each with their own story, personality, and unique way of interacting with the world.

  • A hand-drawn world-with highly detailed illustrations, crafted by our finest artists.

  • Nearly twenty different endings, shaped by your choices and beliefs.

  • Romantic possibilities—because what’s a medieval adventure without a bit of drama?

  • A wide variety of ways to die—both obvious and hidden. Some are so absurd, you might even enjoy them.

  • A world where every lie matters—deception isn't just an option, it's a survival strategy.

  • A mix of dark humour, intrigue, and moral dilemmas—a bounty hunter’s life is rarely noble.

content_descriptors.notes:
The events of our game take place in the era of the Dark Ages, where in everyday life you encounter cruelty, swearing.

The game includes acts of cruelty and violence and is not recommended for easily sensitive people.

name: Kill Ralph

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bit
  • Processor: i9.9 Ghz
  • Graphics: RTX 4090 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: "Lies, treachery, and a bounty worth dying for. You’re no warrior, just a cunning hunter—will your wits be enough to catch Ralph Devora?"
